name: Bigi Pesketa
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2017.

Play this game with up to 3 of your friends ! You will need a controller for each player.

Rules :

  • Launch your anchor to rotate around it
  • Catch fishes
  • Bring them back to the docks to score
  • Steal other's fishes by launching your anchor on theirs
